name: Ad Server Solutions
tag_list: advertising, adserving, ad-serving, ad-exchange, supply-side-platform, demand-side-platform, yield-optimization, mobile-advertising, tablet-advertising, ad-server, mobile, rich-media, mobile-display, mobile-ads, iphone-advertising, ipad-advertising, andro
overview:
Open Source Ad Serving Solutions. Run your own mobile ad network, ad exchange, rtb real time bidding platform using open source advertising network.

Open Source ad technology provider of display and mobile advertising technology, enabling businesses to manage and maximize their ad revenue through ad network and real time bidding. Providing a comprehensive ad platform by combining ad serving, an ad exchange and a breakthrough approach to yield optimization.

Develops and markets one of the main ad serving technologies for the management of online campaigns for media agencies and publishers. Ability to deliver billions of highly targeted impressions per day.

SDK’s for in app mobile advertising included for Iphone, Android, Flash. Open source with source code.

Provides a real time auction bidding ad platform that seamlessly Google Adx, Admeld, Pubmatic, MediaMath, Adbrite, Openx, Rubicon, AppNexus, Criteo, RightMedia, Mopub, Mojiva, AdMob and more

For more information, please visit http://www.adserversolutions.com
